question: Who has become the first Indian to win gold in Senior Commonwealth Fencing Championship 2018 in Canberra?
explanation: Bhavani Devi from India has won the gold in the Sabre event in the Senior Commonwealth Fencing Championship 2018 held in Canberra, Australia. She defeated England\'s Emily Ruaux 15-12 in the final.  With this feat, Bhavani became the first Indian to win a gold medal in the Commonwealth Championship. Earlier, Bhavani Devi won a silver medal in the Tournoi Satellite Fencing Championship in Iceland.
